sqlMap.select: select user_id, user_code, user_name, user_phone_number, user_email, user_type, user_password, user_shop_id, is_online, user_status, create_user_code, modify_user_code, create_time, modify_time, department from t_sys_user_info where user_id = #userId:INTEGER#

select user_id, user_code, user_name, user_phone_number, user_email, user_type, user_password, user_shop_id, is_online, user_status, create_user_code, modify_user_code, create_time, modify_time, department from t_sys_user_info
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_sys_user_info (user_id, user_code, user_name, user_phone_number, user_email, user_type, user_password, user_shop_id, is_online, user_status, create_user_code, modify_user_code, create_time, modify_time, department) values (#userId:INTEGER#, #userCode:VARCHAR#, #userName:VARCHAR#, #userPhoneNumber:VARCHAR#, #userEmail:VARCHAR#, #userType:VARCHAR#, #userPassword:VARCHAR#, #userShopId:INTEGER#, #isOnline:VARCHAR#, #userStatus:VARCHAR#, #createUserCode:VARCHAR#, #modifyUserCode:VARCHAR#, #createTime:TIMESTAMP#, #modifyTime:TIMESTAMP#, #department:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update t_sys_user_info set user_code = #userCode:VARCHAR#, user_name = #userName:VARCHAR#, user_phone_number = #userPhoneNumber:VARCHAR#, user_email = #userEmail:VARCHAR#, user_type = #userType:VARCHAR#, user_password = #userPassword:VARCHAR#, user_shop_id = #userShopId:INTEGER#, is_online = #isOnline:VARCHAR#, user_status = #userStatus:VARCHAR#, create_user_code = #createUserCode:VARCHAR#, modify_user_code = #modifyUserCode:VARCHAR#, create_time = #createTime:TIMESTAMP#, modify_time = #modifyTime:TIMESTAMP#, department = #department:VARCHAR# where user_id = #userId:INTEGER#

user_code = #userCode:VARCHAR#

select count(*) from t_sys_user_info
order by $orderByClause$

select user_id, user_code, user_name, user_phone_number, user_email, user_type, user_password, user_shop_id, is_online, user_status, create_user_code, modify_user_code, create_time, modify_time,department from t_sys_user_info
user_code like '%$userCode$%'
user_name like '%$userName$%'
user_phone_number like '%$userPhoneNumber$%'
user_email like '%$userEmail$%'
user_type = #userType:VARCHAR#
user_password = #userPassword:VARCHAR#
user_shop_id = #userShopId:Integer#
is_online = #isOnline:VARCHAR#
user_status = #userStatus:VARCHAR#
create_user_code = #createUserCode:VARCHAR#
modify_user_code = #modifyUserCode:VARCHAR#
create_time = #createTime:TIMESTAMP#
modify_time = #modifyTime:TIMESTAMP#
department like '%$department$%'

select count(*) from t_sys_user_info
user_code like '%$userCode$%'
user_name like '%$userName$%'
user_phone_number like '%$userPhoneNumber$%'
user_email like '%$userEmail$%'
user_type = #userType:VARCHAR#
user_password = #userPassword:VARCHAR#
user_shop_id = #userShopId:Integer#
is_online = #isOnline:VARCHAR#
user_status = #userStatus:VARCHAR#
create_user_code = #createUserCode:VARCHAR#
modify_user_code = #modifyUserCode:VARCHAR#
create_time = #createTime:TIMESTAMP#
modify_time = #modifyTime:TIMESTAMP#
department like '%$department$%'

select distinct t.user_id, t.user_code, t.user_name, t.user_phone_number, t.user_email, t.user_type, t.user_password, t.user_shop_id,department, t.is_online, t.user_status, t.create_user_code, t.modify_user_code, t.create_time, t.modify_time from t_sys_user_info t,t_order_info t1 where t.user_code = t1.create_user_code and t.user_status = '01' and t.user_type = '01' and (t1.order_run_status = '03' or t1.order_run_status = '06')
to_days(t1.create_time) = to_days(#dayTime:VARCHAR#)
#currentPage:INTEGER#,
#pageRecords:INTEGER#

select count(1) from (select distinct t.user_id, t.user_code, t.user_name, t.user_phone_number, t.user_email, t.user_type, t.user_password, t.user_shop_id,department, t.is_online, t.user_status, t.create_user_code, t.modify_user_code, t.create_time, t.modify_time from t_sys_user_info t,t_order_info t1 where t.user_code = t1.create_user_code and t.user_status = '01' and t.user_type = '01' and (t1.order_run_status = '03' or t1.order_run_status = '06')
to_days(t1.create_time) = to_days(#dayTime:VARCHAR#) ) a
